message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, so how about a 55/45 split in my favor?
I'll give you a little more than before, but I still deserve the bigger share!
This is getting ridiculous Alice. It's a 50/50 split or nothing!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but that's it!
